name: Highway Speed Racing - Best 3D Free Sportcar Driving Race Game with nitro, challange and fast action
name_original: Highway Speed Racing - Best 3D Free Sportcar Driving Race Game with nitro, challange and fast action
description:
Truly illegal but exists and a lot of people like it? It can be a lot of things, but in the world of highways it's the Highway Racing. A unique sport, that has no own racing grounds, has no own cars - racers use their own cars on the common highways to race. It's very dangerous - not only for the racers but for the rest of the people trying to use the highways for transiting. Highway racing events are fast, furious, the cars race over the speed limit, it's an incredible challenge, as the conditions of traffic are changing constantly.

This game is an arcade representation of a high-speed street racing car, so beware of the speed!
YOUR CHALLENGE
Unique top-down view and arcade physics will help you to simulate the movement of a quick racing car on a touch sensitive screen. The environment's traffic is very intensive, driving your car needs a huge concentration from you, the driver. You must be in top form to avoid crashes, to be part of the action for the long time As Highway Speed Racing is against time, expect speedups in packs, but this time you need not to refuel - it will be enough to concentrate on your stunts and driving skills. Don't forget: Motors like nitro, they are quicker then for a short time!
FROM VILLAGES TO HIGHWAYS

Highways - big speed, big risk. Broad roads with a lot of traffic, main arteries of a transit system. In common days highways are easy to use - basically it's function is to guarantee flawless and quick transit from one point to another. But there are people, who uses his highways as racing grounds. They say, that it is fun to drive between the common people, doing stunts, showing speed: it's a real challenge for people with sports cars. A short sprint on the asphalt is priceless - they say, meanwhile they are inside a quick action.

FEATURES

- Lifelike graphics covering real time simulation aspects
- Real driving experience
- Unique sports car driving fun
- Endless gameplay
- Unmatched environment for highway racing
- Different challenges: bottlenecks, heavy traffic, motorcycles, etc...
- Intuitive control methods: direct control using your fingers. Alternate controls with relative touch.
- 3D Environment
- Highway environment with traffic, vehicles and obstacles
- Lots of powerups: Slow Motion, Coin Magnet, Shield, etc.
- Different skins for your vehicle for added gaming fun.
